main event: A visual observation of a UFO was reported on 15 December 1964, with the object disappearing after 30 to 5 seconds.
interesting points: The UFO appeared to be the same size as stars in the sky,The object was initially observed at about 15-20 degrees above the horizon,Observations included a gravitational disturbance near the normal horizon,The object's speed was calculated to be 5Â°/sec,The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds.
